title: Can't Log onto Chat Service
body: The same issue that many others are having. I can log onto League, but it won't log onto chat service. Fix this please.

replies.body: Does Riot not check this board or do they just not care?

I'd say a mixture.

But then again... maybe they just don't like the behaviour of the people here.
i am having the same friggin problem and its annoying.{{champion:84}} {{summoner:14}}
